---
name: Story template
about: A small, deliverable piece of functionality written from the user's perspective, completable within a sprint; often written as "As a [user], I want [goal] so that [benefit]."
title: ''
labels: story
assignees: ''

---

## :trophy: Goal

describes the intention/value of this ticket and should help finish the sentence "When completed, this ticket will ..."

## :dart: Acceptance Criteria

1. a list of individual criteria that must be true for this story to be considered complete

## :memo: Notes

any additional information, context, resources, diagrams, etc that would be helpful in completing this story

## :pushpin: Tasks

- [ ] a list of tasks to accomplish the acceptance criteria
  1. a list of individual criteria that must be true for this task to be considered complete
